parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the master instance.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace to which the permissions are scoped. By default, this parameter is empty when you set RoleType to cluster.

parameters.name: RoleName
parameters.description:
The predefined role. Valid values:

*   admin: administrator
*   dev: developer

parameters.name: RoleType
parameters.description:
The authorization type. Valid values:

*   cluster: specifies that the permissions are scoped to a master instance.
*   namespace: specifies that the permissions are scoped to a namespace of a cluster.

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: The ID of the RAM user.
